text.section: The plaintiff shall commence an action in the small claims division by filing a claim on a form provided by the clerk.
The plaintiff may bring an action in the small claims division in the judicial district where the party defendant or his agent resides or is doing business.
Nothing in this section shall limit the exercise of jurisdiction on any other basis authorized in the Kentucky Revised Statutes or in the Rules of Civil Procedure.

law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 8.
